docs.title: Welcome to XForce Family

docs.text: Overview This bot is created for "X-Force Famiglia". Source code for this bot can be found at github repo Config The repo didn't include the config.json files. Create one for yourself. Here is a template 1 2 3 4 5 { token : , // This is bot token prefix : น้องหลาว , // Prefix, Hardcoded for 1 argument prefix xforce_guild_id : 337686027210719233 // XForce Guild ID }
docs.title: Overview

docs.title: Config

docs.text: {Prefix} mute 1 น้องหลาว mute time #channel @user custom image/message Example 1 น้องหลาว mute 10s #testroom @holfz4848 testing message Arguments Argument Optional Multi Selectable Default Value Explanation time No No - Duration for this mute channel Yes Yes Current Channel Channel for boardcast about mute user No Yes - User to mute custom message Yes Yes Random Message Message to send after mute boardcast. Can be image or message or both
docs.title: Mute

docs.text: 1 น้องหลาว mute time #channel @user custom image/message
docs.title: {Prefix} mute

docs.text: 1 น้องหลาว mute 10s #testroom @holfz4848 testing message
docs.title: Example

docs.text: Argument Optional Multi Selectable Default Value Explanation time No No - Duration for this mute channel Yes Yes Current Channel Channel for boardcast about mute user No Yes - User to mute custom message Yes Yes Random Message Message to send after mute boardcast. Can be image or message or both
docs.title: Arguments

docs.text: {Prefix} say 1 น้องหลาว say #channel custom image/message Example 1 น้องหลาว say #th48-mainland .. Arguments Argument Optional Multi Selectable Default Value Explanation channel Yes Yes Current Channel Channel for send a message custom message No Yes Random Message Message to send after mute boardcast. Can be image or message or both
